com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities
Class Activity_TabHost

java.lang.Object
  TabActivity
      com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities.Activity_TabHost

public class Activity_TabHost
extends TabActivity

Tabs (at the bottom of application) are hosted in this activity. (1=Main, 2=List, 3=New, 4=Filters, 5=Setup) Upon clicking a tab, this activity guides user to the next group of activities or a single activity. Groups of activities are 2=List and 3=New.

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis, Dr. Post-doctoral Researcher, Information Technologies Institute, ITI-CERTH, Thermi, Thessaloniki, Greece ververid@iti.gr, http://mklab.iti.gr

          This context is related to the whole application.
static int IndexGroup
          Current active tab defines the group of activities (1=Main, 2=List, 3=New, 4=Filters, 5=Setup)
static TabHost mTabHost
          The object that hosts all tabs
static int RefrateAR
          Refresh rate in minutes for updating data (DEFAULT:5, Here READ-ONLY, can be modified by Activity_Setup)
static Resources resources
          These resources are related mainly to the language of the GUI and they can be retrieved from the whole application for presenting localized messages (READ-only)

          Changes current activity and colors of the tabSpecs
 boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event)
          if current tab is Main and Group List of issues has a history of many activities then reset Group_list to the first activity of the group so as to remove any history
 Resources SetResources()
          Retrieve Language, Username, Password, and AuthenticationFlag, Refresh rate as it was stored in preferences

Field Detail

ctx

public static Context ctx
This context is related to the whole application. It is useful for presenting messages with Toast from everywhere in the application (READ-only).

Current active tab defines the group of activities (1=Main, 2=List, 3=New, 4=Filters, 5=Setup)

These resources are related mainly to the language of the GUI and they can be retrieved from the whole application for presenting localized messages (READ-only)
